channel.title: Enkrona~~pking~~dicing~~awesome
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][shadow=red,left]Welcome to Enkrona!![/shadow][/size]
This is a PI based pking server!
we have fully working bosses/quests, and minigames!
100% accurate pking and switching!
working dragon claws spec and spirit shield effects!
some pretty nice donator gear (no spoilers here :p)
donator zone/staff zone
many places to pk!
DICING!
a nice pkp exchange
a pking SKILL! "get kills to level it up!"
and much much more!
-----Updates----- ---10/9/12--- Implemented a Halloween event! -all NPC's drop wrapped candy very often! -all NPC's have a 3 out of 1000 chance to drop a korasi! -all NPC's have a 1 out of 10000 chance to drop a red/blue/green h'ween mask!
---10/10/12--- Added a new shop for the Ancient coins (will be known as the AC shop from now on in this thread) -Flame gloves ( best gloves in-game) -Baron shark (heals 35 hp ea) -shadow sword best str bonus wep in-game (cant be used in pk) Added ancient coin drops to all NPC's Fixed glitch with multiple korasi's in 1 drop
---10/11/12--- Fixed KBD lair also fixed some combat issues
---10/12/12--- Fixed some issues with extremes losing prayer in certain areas Fixed drops by some monsters that shouldnt drop certain things
---10/13/12--- Removed dragon defender from starter added some items to the AC shop -Dragon defender -Dragon claws -Torva full helm -Torva platebody -Torva platelegs Fixed pk points saving Added vote4cash ---10/14/12--- Added Extreme Blade GFX Added steadfast/glaiven/ragefire boots Added tokhaar-Kal Released new client ---10/15/12--- Fixed a dupe Edited the halloween candy event Edited crafting Edited some npc drops make them slightly more rare Added Ring of wealth with % helped display on each kill Added crystal key chest with new item rares inside (rare to get)
---12/1/12--- Added Donating with Real cash Added Torva Demon boss with new drops -Torva Blade -Torva armor set -Sword of Destruction -Sword of 1,000 wishes Fixed some rare drops Added player titles updated barrows items Got a new Webhost due to downtime
-----Gear info----- Today a very confusing update was released that has items put into classes of how rare they are the order from least rare to most rare is shown below.
orange<green<purple<yellow<blue
red items are non-tradable.
orange items are common. and DEFAULT some items may be expensive but have not been added to the colors listed about and will remain orange. please post any questionable items here with a picture. if you think its more rare then take a screenshot and post here.
an orange item: [img]http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/3660/orangemf.jpg[/img]
Green items are slightly rarer than the orange items they are usually pretty common but worth a little more. they are classified as uncommons.
a green item: [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/2459/greentiu.jpg[/img]
purple items are usually pretty valuable they are classified as rare items.
a purple item: [img]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/4650/purplew.jpg[/img]
next are Yellow items yellow are classified as Epic items and are some of the most rare items in the game. worth more than rare items they are some of the best items int he game aswell. normally discontinued items are yellow due to the fact that they can not be obtained anymore.
a yellow item: [img]http://img528.imageshack.us/img528/2820/yellowlk.jpg[/img]
Blue items are the rarest items in the game usually very hard to obtain and are very very good. these are classified as Mythic items and there are very few of them.
a blue item: [img]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/8127/bluefv.jpg[/img]
Red items are items that cant be traded although valueless they are still pretty neat :D
a red item: [img]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/2641/redcbo.jpg[/img]
-----Pictures-----
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img254/9144/teleports.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img715/9320/squeal.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img651/9418/skillsx.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img845/3727/turmf.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img441/2035/summbs.jpg[/img]
-----NEW PICTURES----- Vote reward: AC=Ancient Coins [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img17/9624/votereward.jpg[/img]
Ring of Wealth which displays what the drop rate got increased by on each kill! [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img850/2674/rpwj.jpg[/img]
Some of the new items [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img198/2738/newstuffj.jpg[/img]
The newer AC shop [img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/3090/acshop.jpg[/img]
-----MODES----- This part is very important. when you first log onto an account you will be given the option of 2 different game modes.
these modes vary in their abilities
the first is easy, easy is the fastest training mode..basically just lets you max out your stats very fast. but the downside is you dont hit as well as the other mode and your drop rates are reduced
the last option is extreme, these are very slow training but they have some bennefits along with never losing prayer they are also blessed with higher drop rates and hitting more often and slightly higher than mediums!
so choose wisely when you start your account. although you can always make a new one :)
[youtube]http://youtu.be/pNuOBwIAAOc[/youtube]
-----Webclient-----
https://dl.dropbox.com/u/93536668/index.html
-----client-----
https://dl.dropbox.com/u/93536668/client.jar
-----Forums-----
http://enkrona.createaforum.com[/center]

item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:41, topic:463879”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=547853.msg4017073#msg4017073 date=1339722581]
These are the current rules of the board:

[ul][li]All advertisements must be for RuneScape 2 private servers. RSC servers belong here.[/li]
[li]Your websites may be used without approval only in this board. If you wish to reference your website anywhere else on this website (including your signature), refer to this topic.[/li]
[li]You are not allowed to sell anything on this website, no matter what. If you wish to sell anything related to your server, do it outside this site. We are not responsible for anything exchanged out of this website.[/li]
[li]There is one exact restriction. On this website or off, staff ranks must not be sold for anything.[/li]
[li]If any malicious activity is related to your server, it will be banned from this website.[/li]
[li]If you abuse this section via posting in any way (ie, you consistently start flame wars, you get other people to continuously bump your topic, etc), you will be banned from posting in this forum.[/li]
[li]You may not advertise your donation systems in your thread either, but feel free to do so on your website.[/li]
[li]If you bump your own topic by repeatedly removing and re-posting your own post, your topic will be locked and you will not be able to create a new one.[/li][/ul]

Recall all of the above is up to the discretion of the moderators of the forum. The global rules also apply in full here. If you have any questions or concerns, post them in this topic.

-MoparScape Staff
[/quote][/quote]

yes. except this thread was on like 8-9 so i removed and re-posted and edit the comment to bump it notice it says “repeatedly”

Read full topic

item.title: Enkrona~~pking~~dicing~~awesome
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:39, topic:463879”][quote author=imstrength link=topic=567582.msg4150424#msg4150424 date=1352409229]

really adding customs? well those items were real of rs but i mean dont color their name with like <col=red… just leave them have the default name

i didn’t change the color just for some new colored names im organizing rarity of the items obtainable in the game, it makes it more fun. and everyone who plays my server loved the update.

thread has been updated. and ia dded a new youtube video. will post newer pictures in a few
[/quote]

your servers got bugs just falling out of its ass, me and a friend found a huge duel arena bug and scammed about 50b[/quote]

thats cute but the thing is i removed dual arena weeks ago?

OT: today was another client release with some changed gameframes and a new model header to improve the look of many aspects of the server

also had some new models for items such as barrows and armadyl and torva looks much cleaner and nicer now

the info up top has been updated and the thread has been revived due to it being lost. also changed web hosts and added real cash donations via paypal.

Read full topic
